A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I finally went ahead and watched again after I was so disappointed with it at the cinema. And guess what? The last Jedi is definitely not like a fine wine. It is a horrible movie that destroyed the legacy of several key figures. It introduced several useless characters and had several story lines that made no sense or didn't add anything at all. And don't get me started on dropping bombs in space and turbo lasers having trajectory arc in space. Ridiculous.
